mainly US especially in the past, a competition in which young women and girls are judged on their beauty and other qualities: a beauty pageant
UK a show, usually performed outside, that consists of people wearing traditional clothing and acting out historical events: Our youngest son is taking part in the school pageant.
any colourful and impressive show or ceremony
